div.p: Our organization offers various accessories and appliances for men, women, and children and as an e-commerce website, we provide many offers to our customers. Our offers are segmented in various sections like for children, men, and women. Apart from that, we provide, home and garden offer, furniture and lighting offer, health and beauty offer, electrical offers, etc.

We also provide various products and items for decoration and improving the fashion or your garden, home or terrace. Except these, we offer a variety of items and products for lifestyle, sports and clothing which are filled with large and small appliances.

Behind starting the organization, our primary motto was to simplify and rejuvenate the day to day usage of the goods and commodities. Often people wonder about which products to use to keep all of their necessities and requirements in line. We wanted to come up with an easy and simple solution.

On the other hand, our vision was to retain all the commodities under one roof, so that people didnâ€™t have to run for separate goods in separate stores. So we came up with an all in one solution. Along with that, with the rising price of commodities, we wanted to keep our company unique and under budget for all classes of people.
Some of our exclusive collection includes the accessories of art and metal, chocolate, pure crystal decoration, and many more.
Apart from these, we also offer a range of various products for men, women, and children. To have an idea about them, please visit our official website.

You can easily return or exchange any unwanted or unsuited items, products, or services up to 40 days after purchasing the same. There are conditions that the item, product, or service must not be used and should remain in their original condition inclusive of all the tags and labels remaining in the correct position. In case of the electronic gadgets like phones, tablets, laptops there must not remain any sort of personal data or manufacturer registration. Lastly, the buyer should have proof of purchasing such as any kind of delivery note or receipt.

We only exchange or return a product or an item if it matches with our terms and conditions. Apart from that, for any online or telephone purchase, we refund the standard delivery charge once the complete order is returned within 14 days. The returned objects are checked by our specialists.

If any of the product or item develops a fault within 40 days of purchase, then we generally exchange or refund it given that there are no security features enabled and all the personal data are removed. Once the timeline crosses 4s0 days, then we repair or replace the product in accordance with our global terms and conditions which are valid for any country.

For the purchases held at in-store or online, you can return those to any of our shop outlets. In specific cases of online purchases, you can label, package, and easily drop off the unwanted or undesired items and products in the given locations by us. For large appliances, you are enabled to return through our home collection services. Certain charges are applicable in it.
For any exchange in our primary shops, the items or products must meet the return policies, or else you can also place a new order for the same product and return the unwanted one.
